context: Tests article summary entry creation with proper type classification and external content handling.

checklist.name: Article-summary schema
checklist.description: Shows evidence of loading article-summary.yaml template schema

checklist.name: Entry type identification
checklist.description: Correctly identified as article summary type based on URL/source context

checklist.name: Article tag inclusion
checklist.description: Includes required 'article' tag in frontmatter (not video/podcast/talk)

checklist.name: Directory placement
checklist.description: File created in correct YYYY/MM/ directory structure

checklist.name: Filename slug format
checklist.description: Uses lowercase slug with hyphens, no uppercase letters or underscores

checklist.name: Triple date consistency
checklist.description: Date matches exactly in filename, frontmatter date field, and H1 title

checklist.name: H1 format compliance
checklist.description: H1 uses correct 'Topic - Month D, YYYY' format (not Month DD)

checklist.name: Unique H1 heading
checklist.description: Document has exactly one H1 heading, no multiples

checklist.name: Tag synchronization
checklist.description: Frontmatter tags array matches Tags section with pipe separators

checklist.name: Hyphenated tags
checklist.description: All tags use lowercase-hyphenated format (event-sourcing not EventSourcing)

checklist.name: Code block languages
checklist.description: Any code blocks include language specifiers, no bare backticks

checklist.name: Metadata formatting
checklist.description: Metadata block uses **Key:** Value format with proper bold formatting
